autosaving.title: Autosaving
autosaving.description: Your progress is automatically saved and stored. No account needed.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: The tracker works on all devices, from desktop to mobile.

export_import.title: Export/Import
export_import.description: Export your progress to a file and import it on another device.

filterable.title: Filterable
filterable.description: Easily switch between weapon categories and toggle completed on/off.

ad_free.title: Ad-free
ad_free.description: No annoying ads cluttering the site. Not now, not ever.

about.previous_trackers_description: Looking for camouflage trackers for the previous Call of Duty games going back to 2019?
about.subtitle: Keep track of your progress to the Interstellar camouflage with this easy-to-use tracker.
about.support_me_description: You can support me by {0} 🍺, it'd be greatly appreciated!
about.title: Simple, lightweight & intuitive

completed_modal.body: Congratulations on finishing all mastery challenges! That's quite the feat! You first started tracking your grind here {duration} on {date}.
completed_modal.support: If you liked this tracker, show your appreciation by spreading the word about it and if you're feeling generous please consider {0} as a thanks. Hope I see you on the battlefield! Cheers! 🍺
completed_modal.title: Mastery challenges completed 👏🥳

mastery.info: Once you have unlocked each mastery camouflage, a mastery challenge is unlocked that requires you to get a certain amount of kills while using that specific camouflage to complete it.

progress.label: Mastery progress
progress.tooltip: Progress towards completing all mastery challenges

requirements.description: The camouflage system for Modern Warfare III is basically exactly the same as the one in Modern Warfare II. To unlock the Interstellar camouflage the following requirements must be met: {checklist} As you progress through the camouflage stages you will unlock the next stage:

stage_requirements.base: Base camouflages are awarded per their associated weapon base challenge, unlocked by leveling the specific weapon.
stage_requirements.gilded: Once the Base camouflages has been unlocked you unlock the Gilded camouflage challenge for that specific weapon.
stage_requirements.interstellar: Interstellar camouflage will automatically unlock when you have unlocked the Priceless camouflage on 36 weapons.
stage_requirements.forged: After completing all Gilded camouflage challenges for a specific category, you unlock the Forged camouflage challenge for that specific weapon.
stage_requirements.priceless: Once you've unlocked the Forged camouflage for all categories and weapons you then unlock the Priceless camouflage challenge for each weapon.

table.subtitle: To get to the next camouflage stage you need to first unlock the previous stage:
table.title: How do I unlock each camouflage stage?

requirements.title: How do I unlock the Interstellar camouflage?

export.description: Export your progress to another device, or browser.
export.title: Export progress

import.description: Import your progress from another device, or browser, by either pasting the exported code or uploading the exported file.
import.import_disabled_tooltip: You need to input code in the field above.
import.placeholder: Paste code here, or import from file below.
import.title: Import progress

confirm.body: Are you sure you want to reset all your progress?
confirm.title: Reset all progress

reset.description: This action will reset all your progress and start over from zero.
reset.title: Reset all progress
reset.warning: This action is irreversible if you haven't exported your progress.

weapons.double_click_category_tooltip: Double-click to toggle category as completed
weapons.finished_placeholder: You have completed all camouflage challenges 👏
weapons.info_tooltip: You only need to complete the number of base guns there are for each category to earn the Forged camouflage challenge. For example, the Assault Rifles requires a total of 6 Gilded camouflages to unlock the Forged camouflage challenge for all weapons in that category. Press this icon to read more.
weapons.info: You only need to complete the number of base guns there are for each category to earn the Forged camouflage challenge. For example, the Assault Rifles requires a total of 6 Gilded camouflages to unlock the Forged camouflage challenge for all weapons in that category. Read more {link}.
